A C D G I J M N O R S V

A

AbstractCreditCardValidator - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator.
Purpose: an abstract implementation of a CreditCardValidator that provides most of the base functionality of the CreditCardValidator interface and provides some new functionality: the ability to 'or' validators together and the ability to mutate the algorithm.
AbstractCreditCardValidator(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: creates the AbstractCreditCardValidator and sets the default identifier.  This constructor assumes that the ValidationAlgorithm will be set later.
AbstractCreditCardValidator(String, ValidationAlgorithm) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: creates the AbstractCreditCardValidator and sets the default identifier and ValidationAlgorithm.
AbstractValidationAlgorithm - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.AbstractValidationAlgorithm.
Purpose: an abstract implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that provides operator type of functionality (and, or, not).
AbstractValidationAlgorithm() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.AbstractValidationAlgorithm
 
AmericanExpressValidator - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AmericanExpressValidator.
Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate AmericanExpress issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
AmericanExpressValidator() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AmericanExpressValidator
Purpose: create the instance of a American Express issued credit card validator.
addCreditCardValidator(CreditCardValidator) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: adds a new CreditCardValidator to the registry using the default identifier.
addCreditCardValidator(String, CreditCardValidator) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: adds a new CreditCardValidator to the registry associating it with the Identifier.
and(ValidationAlgorithm) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.AbstractValidationAlgorithm
Purpose: This method provides an 'and' type of operator to algorithms.  This method will return a AbstractValidationAlgorithm that can perform an 'and' operation between the 'this' and another algorithm.

C

CreditCardValidator - interface com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidator.
Purpose: Defines the contract a CreditCardValidator must implement for this component to use it.
CreditCardValidatorRegistry - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry.
Purpose: Acts as a registry for all the CreditCardValidators that are defined by this component and/or the application and can be initialized from a configuration file.  The validators contained within this class are mutatable by the application.
CreditCardValidatorRegistry() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: Creates an instance of the registry retrieving a default list of validators from the configuration file.
CreditCardValidatorRegistry(boolean) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: Creates an instance of the registry retrieving a default list of validators from the configuration file if specified (see component specification for a listing of the configuration).
CustomValidator - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CustomValidator.
Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will allow the application to setup it's own validator.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
CustomValidator(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CustomValidator
Purpose: creates the CustomValidator instance with the given default identifier.  This constructor assume the application will set a validation algorithm later.
CustomValidator(String, ValidationAlgorithm) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CustomValidator
Purpose: creates the CustomValidator instance with the given default identifier and ValidationAlgorithm. 
clearCreditCardValidators() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: removes all CreditCardValidators from this registry
com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation - package com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation
 
com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms - package com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms
 

D

DinersClubValidator - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.DinersClubValidator.
Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate Diners Club/Carte Blanche issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
DinersClubValidator() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.DinersClubValidator
Purpose: create the instance of a Diners Club/Carte Blanche  issued credit card validator.
DiscoverValidator - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.DiscoverValidator.
Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate Discover issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
DiscoverValidator() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.DiscoverValidator
Purpose: create the instance of a American Express issued credit card validator.

G

getCreditCardValidator(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: returns a the CreditCardValidators that is associated with the Identifier
getCreditCardValidators() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: returns a map of CreditCardValidators that are registered with this class, where the associated identifier is the key.
getDefaultIdentifier() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method will get the current default identifier for this implementation.
getDefaultIdentifier() - Method in interface com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method will return the default identifier for the implementation.  Will be used by the CreditCardValidatorRegistry#addCreditCardValidator(creditCardValidator) method to determine what identifier to associate this implementation with.
getEndPrefix() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationRange
Purpose: This method will get return the endPrefix variable
getInstance() - Static method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: returns the singleton instance of the registry.  If this is the first time it is called, the registry will automatically be loaded from the configuration file.
getLength() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatLength
Purpose: This method will get return the length variable
getPosition() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationRange
Purpose: This method will get return the position variable
getStartPrefix() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationRange
Purpose: This method will get return the startPrefix variable
getValidation() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method will get the current ValidationAlgorithm that will be used by this class.

isValid(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method will return whether the passed string is valid or not for this CreditCardValidator .   Please see CreditCardValidator#isValid(String) for more details
isValid(String) - Method in interface com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method will validate the given credit card text against the rules defined by the implementation of this interface.
isValid(String) - Method in interface com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationAlgorithm
Purpose: This method will validate the given credit card text against the rules defined by the implementation of this interface.
isValid(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatAllDigits
Purpose: validates the passed text by checking to see the passed text is all digits ('0'-'9').  Please see ValidationAlgorithm#isValid(String) for more details
isValid(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatLength
Purpose: validates the passed text by checking to see the passed text is a specified length.  Please see ValidationAlgorithm#isValid(String) for more details
isValid(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationLUHN
Purpose: validates the passed text by appling the LUHN algorithm.  Please see ValidationAlgorithm#isValid(String) for more details
isValid(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationRange
Purpose: validates the passed text by checking to see if the specified position/length is with (inclusive) the range.  Please see ValidationAlgorithm#isValid(String) for more details

MII_AIRLINES_OTHER - Static variable in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationPrefix
Purpose: a constant representing the prefix for the Major Industry Identity prefix for 'Airlines and other industry assignments'

N

not() - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.AbstractValidationAlgorithm
Purpose: This method provides an 'not' type of operator to algorithms.  This method will return a AbstractValidationAlgorithm that can perform an 'not' operation on this algorithm

O

or(CreditCardValidator) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method is utility method to create an 'or' condition between this validator and another onte.  This method will return an AbstractCreditCardValidation that can perform an 'or' operation between the this and another CreditCardValidations
or(ValidationAlgorithm) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.AbstractValidationAlgorithm
Purpose: This method provides an 'or' type of operator to algorithms.  This method will return a AbstractValidationAlgorithm that can perform an 'or' operation between the 'this' and another algorithm.

R

removeCreditCardValidator(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: removes the CreditCardValidators that is associated with the Identifier from this registry

S

setValidation(ValidationAlgorithm) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.AbstractCreditCardValidator
Purpose: This method will set the ValidationAlgorithm that will be used by this class.

V

ValidationAlgorithm - interface com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationAlgorithm.
Purpose: Defines the contract a ValidationAlgorithm must implement for this component to use it.
ValidationFormatAllDigits - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatAllDigits.
Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that validates that passed credit card is all digits ('0'-'9')
ValidationFormatAllDigits() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatAllDigits
Purpose: creates an instance of the ValidationFormatAllDigits class that will validate that the text is all digits
ValidationFormatLength - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatLength.
Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that validates that passed credit card is a specific length
ValidationFormatLength(int) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationFormatLength
Purpose: creates an instance of the ValidationFormatLength class that will validate that the text is a certain length
ValidationLUHN - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationLUHN.
Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that applys the LUHN algorithm ot the test string
ValidationLUHN() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationLUHN
Purpose: simply creates an instance of the ValidationLUHN class
ValidationPrefix - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationPrefix.
Purpose: an subclass of ValidationRange that specifically checks for a prefix.  This is a utility/helper class to more easily define prefixes.
ValidationPrefix(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationPrefix
Purpose: creates an instance of the ValidationPrefix class that will validate a single prefix.  .
ValidationPrefix(String, String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationPrefix
Purpose: creates an instance of the ValidationPrefix class that will validate a range of prefixs.   
ValidationRange - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationRange.
Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that validates that the digits at a specific position are within a specified range.
ValidationRange(String, String, int) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms.ValidationRange
Purpose: creates an instance of the ValidationRange class that will validate a range of numbers at a specific position within the credit card number text. 
VisaValidator - class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.VisaValidator.
Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate Visa issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
VisaValidator() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.VisaValidator
Purpose: create the instance of a Visa issued credit card validator.
validate(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.CreditCardValidatorRegistry
Purpose: This method will validate the given credit card text against all CreditCardValidators that are registered and return a list of strings that identify the credit card the text is valid for.
